design_system.description: A sophisticated, dark-themed aesthetic inspired by the deep ocean at night, illuminated by moonlight and ship lights. Designed for high-contrast visibility on IPTV screens and intimate elegance on personal devices.

iptv_mode.navigation: Fixed sidebar or top-bar with large, focusable touch targets (min 64px)
iptv_mode.card_style: Large, poster-like cards with cinematic aspect ratios (16:9)
iptv_mode.interaction: Focus states must be highly visible (thick gold borders or scaling)

mobile_mode.navigation: Bottom floating dock with blur effect
mobile_mode.card_style: Vertical stack, swipeable carousels for menus

buttons.primary: bg-white text-slate-950 hover:bg-amber-100 transition-all duration-300 font-medium px-8 py-4 rounded-full shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(255,255,255,0.2)]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-white/20 text-white hover:bg-white/10 transition-all duration-300 px-8 py-4 rounded-full
buttons.ghost: text-slate-300 hover:text-white hover:bg-white/5 px-4 py-2 rounded-lg

cards.feature: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-3xl bg-slate-900/50 border border-white/5 hover:border-amber-500/50 transition-all duration-500
cards.menu_item: flex justify-between items-center p-4 border-b border-white/5 hover:bg-white/5 transition-colors

inputs.default: bg-white/5 border-white/10 text-white placeholder:text-slate-500 focus:border-amber-500/50 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-amber-500/50 rounded-xl h-12 px-4

assets.icons: Use Lucide React icons with thin stroke width (1.5px) for elegance.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a hybrid Hospitality App that works on both Mobile and IPTV. Prioritize high contrast and large touch targets. The aesthetic is 'Midnight Luxury' - dark backgrounds, gold accents, serif typography.
setup: Install fonts: Playfair Display and Manrope from Google Fonts.
Configure Tailwind theme to match the 'Midnight Ocean Luxury' palette.
Ensure all interactive elements have `data-testid` attributes.

pages.home: Create a 'Bento Grid' layout. Hero section with the ship exterior. Quick access cards for 'Dining', 'Excursions', 'Concierge'.
pages.restaurants: List view with immersive background images for each venue. Clicking opens a modal or page with the Menu.
pages.menu: Digital menu with categories (Starters, Mains, Wines). Use glassmorphism for the menu container over the restaurant background.
pages.chat: Floating action button (FAB) or dedicated tab. Chat interface should look like a premium concierge service (gold/black bubbles).
pages.kiosk: Simplified 'Touch to Start' interface. High contrast, massive buttons.

instructions_to_main_agent.accessibility: Ensure text contrast is at least 4.5:1. Use ARIA labels for all icon buttons. Support keyboard navigation for IPTV remote control simulation.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very large headline.
Avoid pure black (#000000); use Slate-950 (#020617) for richness.
Use 2x more padding than you think is necessary.
Animations should be slow and smooth (duration-500 or duration-700).
Never use default scrollbars; style them to be thin and dark.
